DellCertificate.description: This resource contains information about a SecureBoot Certificate.
DellCertificate.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a SecureBoot Certificate.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CertificateSubtype.longDescription: This property shall represent the subtype of the certificate.

CertificateType.longDescription: This property shall represent the type of certificate.

CryptographicHash.description: A string providing the Cryptographic Hash value of SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512.
CryptographicHash.longDescription: A string providing the Cryptographic Hash value of SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512.

Hash.description: The Hash value of a file.
Hash.longDescription: Hash of the file, which can be of type SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512.

IssuerCommonName_CN.longDescription: This property shall represent the issuer common name.

IssuerCountryCode_CC.longDescription: This property shall represent the issuer country code.

IssuerLocality_L.longDescription: This property shall represent the issuer locality.

IssuerOrganization_O.longDescription: This property shall represent the issuer organization.

IssuerOrganizationalUnit_OU.longDescription: This property shall represent the issuer organizational unit.

IssuerState_S.longDescription: This property shall represent the issuer state.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

SecureBootPolicy.longDescription: This property shall represent the SecureBoot Policy enabled on the system.

SubjectCommonName_CN.longDescription: This property shall represent the subject common name.

SubjectCountryCode_CC.longDescription: This property shall represent the subject country code.

SubjectLocality_L.longDescription: This property shall represent the subject locality.

SubjectOrganization_O.longDescription: This property shall represent the subject organization.

SubjectOrganizationalUnit_OU.longDescription: This property shall represent the isubject organizational unit.

SubjectState_S.longDescription: This property shall represent the subject state.

Thumbprint.longDescription: The Unique identifier for a particular certificate.

ValidFrom.description: A string providing the validity start date.
ValidFrom.longDescription: A string providing the validity start date.

ValidTo.description: A string providing the validity end date.
ValidTo.longDescription: A string providing the validity end date.

title: #DellCertificate.v1_0_0.DellCertificate
